title: Skin
body:
POKEMON TRAINER Ziggs.

Its the perfect legendary, ultimate, whatever tier skin you want, it will make you so much money riot.

Have elements as chromas that change the skins effects slightly e.g Fire, Water, Electric, Grass chromas.

Ziggs Q are obviously pokeballs with all the snazzy effects riot can come up with
Ziggs W do whatever you want (I'm sure you could think of something)
Ziggs E could be some type of team rocket themed trap
Ziggs R the animation before it does dmg is a big poke ball shadow. On explosion depending on the chroma theme there can be an explosion with one of the well known pokemon coming up in flames/water/whatever chroma or theme you have for it. e.g the fire chroma a big charzard or something, could come out in the flames on explosion.

And obviously kit ziggs out with a wicked backpack, some slick kicks, and the og cap

It seems cool if you got the imagination, which I sure you have, and it will make riot money.

Cant wait to see it :)

replies.body: Smells like a law suit just waiting to happen
